function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of synergy between top-down and bottom-up approaches","Impact":"Ineffective implementation of community-based approaches, leading to uncontrolled disease spread","Mitigation":"Develop a framework for better coordination and communication between top-down and bottom-up approaches","Technologies":"Communication technologies for data sharing and collaboration","People":"Community members, public health organizations","Owner":"Government, NGOs, international agencies"},{"Description":"Bottlenecks at the top of the health system","Impact":"Impaired performance of local interventions due to institutional and systemic weaknesses","Mitigation":"Reform and strengthen the top of the health system to facilitate better implementation of local interventions","Technologies":"Health information systems, governance tools","People":"Health system administrators, policymakers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Emphasis on unsustainable pilot studies","Impact":"Ineffective integration of research findings into the health system, leading to wasted resources","Mitigation":"Develop a strategy for sustainable integration of research findings into the health system","Technologies":"Data management systems, research integration tools","People":"Researchers, health system administrators","Owner":"Research institutions, government"}]}
